meanings.definition: A wealthy man who spends his time enjoying himself, especially one who behaves irresponsibly or is sexually promiscuous.
meanings.sent1: The playboy drove his fancy car around town, showing off his wealth.
meanings.sent2: The playboy was always surrounded by beautiful women at the club.
meanings.sent3: The playboy's extravagant lifestyle often landed him in trouble with the law.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a playboy made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The playboy's lavish parties were the envy of all his friends.

meanings.definition: A man who is devoted to a life of leisure and pleasure, often involving socializing and partying.
meanings.sent1: The young playboy spent his days lounging by the pool and his nights at the hottest clubs.
meanings.sent2: The playboy was always the life of the party, charming everyone with his wit and charisma.
meanings.sent3: Despite his carefree attitude, the playboy was surprisingly good at chess.
meanings.sent4: In the world of socialites, he was known as the ultimate playboy.
meanings.sent5: The playboy's carefree attitude was infectious, drawing others into his world of fun and excitement.

meanings.definition: A lifestyle characterized by luxury, indulgence, and pursuit of pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The playboy's penthouse apartment was filled with expensive furniture and artwork.
meanings.sent2: Living the playboy lifestyle meant never having to worry about money or responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: Despite his playboy image, he secretly enjoyed quiet nights at home with a good book.
meanings.sent4: Her friends often joked that she lived like a modern-day playboy, always jet-setting to exotic locations.
meanings.sent5: The playboy's Instagram was a constant stream of envy-inducing photos from his luxurious vacations.
